verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: soft chewy] [V: caramels] one of my first experiences with cooking was helping my mother make these caramels we 'd make up to 12 batches each year today i do at least 95 percent of the cooking at home but my wife does much of the baking —robert sprenkle hurst texas
